nodes.text: The Mission to Christophsis took place on Christophsis during the Clone Wars.

When Christophsis was overrun by Separatist forces, a group of clone troopers was sent to the planet to retrieve lost data before the Separatists could get their hands on them. The clones were to locate and retrieve five datapacks.
During the mission, they encountered and eliminated several B1 and B2 battle droids. They eventually recovered the databacks.

The mission constitutes the first level of the online game Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Live Fire which is part of the advertising campaign pertaining to the Clone Wars film. As of now it is not known whether it is actually a part of the Battle of Christophsis or a separate mission.
